Plays > Kiichi's Book of Strategy

– Click image to view.

Kiichi's Book of Strategy

(鬼一法眼三略巻) (Kiichi Hōgen sanryaku no maki)

Written By: Matsuda Bunkōdō (文耕堂) , Hasegawa Senshi (長谷川千四)

First Staged: 1731

Reference: Hironaga, Shūzaburō, The Bunraku Handbook (Tokyo: Maison des Arts, 1976); Kokuritsu Gekijō jōen shiryōshū, edited by Kokuritsu Gekijō Geinō Chōsashitsu, vol. 168, September 1979; Bunraku November 1991 Performance Program

Kashira:

Wakaotoko (若男)

Ōdanshichi (大団七)

Darasuke (陀羅助)

Yokanbei (与勘平)

Musume (娘)

Kenbishi (検非違使)

Kiichi (鬼一)

Karasu tengu (烏天狗)

Otoko chū koyaku (男中子役)

Oniwaka chū koyaku (鬼若中子役)

Hagataki (端敵)

Sadanoshin (定之進)

Oniwaka (鬼若)

Baba (婆)

Fukeoyama (老女形)

Otoko koyaku (男子役)

Performances:

April 1973: Kiichi's Book of Strategy

August 1978: Kiichi's Book of Strategy

April 1979: Kiichi's Book of Strategy

September 1979: Kiichi's Book of Strategy

November 1981: Kiichi's Book of Strategy

August 1986 National Bunraku Theatre, Osaka: Kiichi's Book of Strategy

December 1987: Kiichi's Book of Strategy

November 1991: Kiichi's Book of Strategy

August 1993: Kiichi's Book of Strategy

September 1993: Kiichi's Book of Strategy

September 1995: Kiichi's Book of Strategy

December 1997 Bunraku Kanshō Kyōshitsu: Kiichi's Book of Strategy

Scenes:

The Hideout at Kitasaga (北嵯峨)

The Quarrel (喧嘩)

Sakuramaru's Suicide (桜丸切腹)

Mount Tempai (天拝山)

The Pine-Lined Road at Akasaka (赤坂並木)

The Dance of Sambaso (二人三番叟)

Characters:

Kiyomori (平清盛)

Hiromori (播磨大掾広盛)

Tankai Kasahara (笠原湛海)

Minazuru (皆鶴姫)

Kobata (腰元木幡)

Chienai, in fact Kisanta (奴智恵内実は吉岡鬼三太)

Kiichi (吉岡鬼一法眼)

Torazo, in fact Ushiwakamaru (奴虎蔵実は牛若丸)

Benkei (武蔵坊弁慶)

Kijiro (吉岡鬼次郎)

Kisanta (吉岡鬼三太)

Umechiyo (稚児梅千代丸)

Takemaru (稚児竹丸)

Iwachiyo (広盛一子岩千代丸)

Dampei (市原団平)

Shokei (性慶阿闍梨)

Oniwaka, later known as Benkei (鬼若丸後に武蔵坊弁慶)

Asuka (乳母飛鳥)

Okyo (妻お京)

Buzenbo (天狗豊前坊)

Sanukibo (天狗讃岐坊)

Togakushibo (天狗戸隠坊)

Sojobo (僧正坊)

Ushiwakamaru (牛若丸)

Maids (腰元)
